title: Dialogues with the Devil
description: Only a writer as eloquent as Taylor Caldwell can bring into such dramatic focus the mystery and terror of life. The revelations unfolded here illuminate the darkest corners of the human soul and strip us naked in the mirror of our own evil. What is to be the fate of the Universe? Of Man? Of Earth? Of the Devil? Does someone, somewhere, know? And, if so, who? Dialogues with the Devil is a breathtaking adventure of the mind into the soul that will live in your memory for a long time to come.
author: Taylor Caldwell
